name: love wish 2
description:
Love Wish 2 is a relaxing and challenging casual game that is completely upgraded more than our previous games! ♪(^∇^ *)
You'll get Love Points while playing the levels, and use them to summon(draw) pretty girl cards. Let's play with them and collect their hot animation❤

Game features:
❤ 54 levels
❤ Easter eggs
❤ Drawable girl character cards
❤ More than 90+ achievements
❤ 20 girls with anime motion effects
If you enjoyed our game, please add it to your wish list. Thanks!
